TopicTitle: KSP 1.12.1 causing steering issues with mod wheels.

Articles.Content:
Hi. A mod wheel that had no problems up till 1.11.2 is now locking up and not steering properly. Has anyone else had an issue with mod wheels and if so do you know a fix? The wheel I am having pronlems with is the Moon Buggy wheel from MajorTom69's Space 1999 Eagle Transporter 3 Pack

https://spacedock.info/mod/1373/Space 1999 Eagle Transporter 3 Pack
Hi. I managed to use the set out in the new stock rover wheels to fix the problem. Tested on 1.12.1 and 1.11.2 without issue.
